description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) has used hashdump, [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), Procdump, and the Windows Credential Editor to dump password hashes from memory and authenticate to other user accounts.(Citation: FireEye APT41 Aug 2019)(Citation: Group IB APT 41 June 2021)(Citation: apt41_dcsocytec_dec2022)
